li.label: Bovid muzzle
li.description: Eating veggies has never been better!

li.label: Bovid muzzle
li.description: This will go away on its own right...?

li.label: Bovid muzzle
li.description: I'll never want for anything but grass ever again!

li.label: Bovid ears
li.description: I think I can hear the wind through the grass more intensely than before....

li.label: Bovid ears
li.description: Oh I think I can hear some good grass with these!

li.label: Bovid ears
li.description: Hope no one tries to put a tag in these!

li.label: Bovid tail
li.description: This won't help against megascarabs will it?

li.label: Bovid tail
li.description: I like feeling it flick back and forth on its own like that!

li.label: Bovid tail
li.description: I don't think I'll be able to hide this...
